para.para: Crank System provides basic data structures. Some of them would not relevant to games, but they can be used for modeling and/or simulating specific types of game worlds.

simplesect.title: Compound numeric types with imaginary parts.
simplesect.para: Crank System comes up with two compound types with imaginary parts. One is a complex type, the other is a quaternion type.
While complex type is not useful itself, quaternion type is frequently used, especially for rotations.
